member.name: T:Apworks.Storage.MySql.MySqlWhereClauseBuilder`1
member.summary: Represents the where clause builder for MySql database.
member.typeparam: The type of the data object which would be mapped to a certain table in the relational database.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the MySqlWhereClauseBuilder<TDataObject> class.
member.param: The Apworks.Storage.IStorageMappingResolver instance which will be used for generating the mapped field names.

member.name: P:Apworks.Storage.MySql.MySqlWhereClauseBuilder`1.ParameterChar
member.summary: Gets a System.Char value which represents the leading character to be used by the database parameter.
